author: Emily Elise

review: This is a really nice device with excellent performance.  The 1 thing that it is lacking however is a built in dlna / upnp client.  All of my other devices have dlna clients and I store all my home videos on my NAS.  All of my kindle fires, android phones, ipad, and smart tvs have built in support or can easily download free apps to watch these videos no problem, however this doesn't appear to be an option for the fire stick.I was able to side load a dlna client, however it was not intuitive and it took a long time to find one that actually worked properly.  I will gladly upgrade my review to 5 stars if they ever add builtin support for dlna / upnp (or provide a supported app that can be downloaded even if it's ad based).As far as netflix and amazon videos go, this thing has performed flawlessly with much better performance than any of my other smart tvs or mobile devices.
